issue.title: [C++] Collapse Take APIs from 8 to 1 or 2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8905](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8905). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are currently 8 `arrow::compute::Take` functions with different function signatures. Fewer functions would make life easier for binding developers
